VmatchU lets any real estate agent or a layperson fill the form of his requirements whether for selling, purchasing or renting any property and then VmatchU shows all available matches after form submission. Our system works in a unique way that it provides separate services for agents and laypersons: – If you are an agent and once you submit your form, we will notify you, for until a period of 30 days, whenever we find someone whose requirement matches with yours and you can contact the person for further details. – If you are a layperson seeking property dealing, then VmatchU will give you a total of five login opportunities monthly, where you can submit your requirement to get a perfect match. Once a form is submitted, then only the agent will contact you himself for the further dealing. The users can hide/pause the suggestions of matches anytime they want, and change his property status to “sold” or “purchased”.
What makes VmatchU unique?
Following features demonstrate why VmatchU should be your first platform in the realm of property dealing
You can grow your connections with other agents through our B2B Agent System. VmatchU lets you connect with other agents of the field and help build a integrated professional environment.

End consumer version of this portal is highly beneficial for the real estate industry as the requirements of a layperson user of VmatchU are only shown to his perfect match. The agents, with only perfect matches, then contact the layperson themselves. This feature helps our subscribers from unwanted calls.

We are also offering Administrative Rights to companies’ owners, which enable them to monitor and manage their employees/sub-agents. This option facilitates owners in knowing their team’s work efficiency, products’ market price, market trends (due to matching), subsequently, helping to keep a check on any hidden deals by the sub-agents.
This portal is specifically designed to facilitate real estate business, it mainly offers B2B dealings, in addition to some B2C communication.
